alert.note: Alert for Huron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 12:39AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Huron County through 145 AM EDT... At 1238 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Au Gres, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Caseville around 100 AM EDT. Port Austin and Kinde around 125 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Pinnebog, Port Crescent State Park, Filion and Bay Port. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
